subject: Leadership
title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
description: A micro-lesson that makes Cross-Functional Collaboration usable.

hook.text: Engineering builds a feature marketing never asked for. Marketing promises one engineering can't deliver.

buildup.text: Cross-functional teams combine diverse expertise to solve complex problems, but misaligned goals create friction.

discovery.text: Shared objectives and regular syncs reduce misalignment. Spotify's squad model is a well-known approach.

twist.text: Cross-functional doesn't mean everyone does everything. Each person applies their specialty toward one goal.

climax.text: Leaders bridge silos with shared metrics, joint planning sessions, and visible dependencies across teams.

punchline.text: Silos protect departments. Bridges protect the mission.

quiz.question: What reduces misalignment in cross-functional teams?
options: Having one function lead all decisions
